column2: AD FrameAll aluminum frames shall be pre-assembled at factory incorporating welded construction for all joints. Each grille section shall incorporate an invisible section divider integrated and welded within the frame. Frames and grilles shall be shipped fully assembled in protective wooden crating to each jobsite. For sections larger than 6' 0 by 8' 0 a mechanical joint is to be provided, (if specified).
column4: All aluminum frames shall be pre-assembled at factory incorporating welded construction for all joints. column2: Mats Inc. offers a comprehensive line of aluminum frames and transitions for all of our products to ensure smooth transitions and trouble-free installations. Frames are sold in full lengths, or in 1´ increments and should be cut to the appropriate size and mitered on-site to ensure proper fit. Many Aluminum Foot Grilles are supplied with frame systems fabricated specifically for the product type and installation method. These frames are shipped with the Foot Grilles. Additional frames are not required. Consult our trained Product Specialists for details.

column2: TT Overlap FrameAll aluminum frames shall be pre-assembled at factory incorporating welded construction for all joints. Each grille section shall incorporate an invisible section divider integrated and welded within the frame. Frames and grilles shall be shipped fully assembled in protective wooden crating to each jobsite. For sections larger than 6' 0 by 8' 0 a mechanical joint is to be provided (if specified). A silicone joint is to be applied between the frame and the finished floor to prevent any water infiltration (by others).

Frames and grilles shall be shipped fully assembled in protective wooden crating to each jobsite. For sections larger than 6' 0 by 8' 0 a mechanical joint is to be provided, (if specified).

column4: FloorFx is unique acoustical underlayment designed specifically for 2mm and 3mm Floorworks LVT. Different than other sound absorption layers, FloorFx offers a rigid design, which virtually eliminates denting common in all other sound barriers. FloorFx has been engineered to provide simple installation reducing install by 50% compared to other systems.

column17:
Square Edge Tile, Interlocking Tile

Size
Square Edge Tile: 38" x 38"
Interlocking Tile: 37" x 37"
Sizes are approximate

Thickness
Square Edge Tile: 4 mm, 5 mm, 6 mm, 7 mm, 8 mm, 9 mm, 10 mm, 12 mm
Interlocking Tile: 8 mm, 9 mm, 10 mm, 12 mm


Recommended Installation
4 mm tiles must be glued down. We strongly recommend a glue down installation for 6 mm tiles. 8 mm, 10 mm and 12 mm tiles can be loose laid.

Premium water based acrylic spray adhesive designed for specific Mats Inc. flooring; please confirm with the flooring product documentation. 
Uses 80% less adhesive than many trowel applied adhesives.
Provides instant shear strength and allows for immediate trafficking without adhesive indenting or displacement. 
Non-toxic product that adheres to concrete, plywood, metal, Gypsum and many more correctly prepared surfaces.

column2:
Designed for HIGH traffic conditions (1,500 to 5,000 people per day).
The dual-fiber construction eliminates and hides dirt and moisture.
Advanced water removal and retention properties – stops up to 80% of dirt and moisture at the door.
The fiber loop system simultaneously scrapes off soil and absorbs water.
The loops are randomly arranged delivering excellent durability and appearance over time. 
Available as factory edged mats, custom sized mats or rolls.

Please note: You will receive a chain set for this collection

column2:
Formative Clic is inspired by the beauty and design of natural hardwood floors. Formative Clic offers all of the refinement of authentic wood planks combined with the benefits of resilient flooring.

Formative Clic features:


Easy installation: Formative Clic planks click together easily with an edge-locking system for a glue-less installation that saves labor time and money.
Quick shipping: Heavy inventory levels available in the US provide for immediate delivery, allowing tight timelines to be met.
Acoustic backing: The acoustic backing dampens sound transmission with an IIC value of 61 (ASTM E492), creating a quieter and more comfortable environment.
